alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; Northumberland; Richmond; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 8:12PM EDT until June 16 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northumberland County in eastern Virginia... East central Richmond County in east central Virginia... Southeastern Westmoreland County in east central Virginia... Northeastern Lancaster County in eastern Virginia... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 811 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Callao, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lewisetta around 825 PM EDT. Heathsville around 830 PM EDT. Wicomico Church around 850 PM EDT. Fair Port around 900 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lara, Browns Store, Lottsburg, Village, Regina, Avalon, Moon Corner, Reedville, Lilian and Hull Neck. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
